comments:
Build ID: WST=200706260303

Steps To Reproduce:
The TLD file included in different JAR might not be
opened at the same time.
The name of the TLD file not opened is the same. 

EX) Java Pet Store Reference Application uses bp-ui-14.jar
    and bp-ui-5.jar. ui.tld is included in of each file.

1. Two files are stored in
   (Web project)/WebContent/WEB-INF/lib folder.
2. The ui.tld file of bp-ui-14.jar is opened
   from the project Explorer. 

   (Project) > Java Resoures: src
     > Libraries > Web App Libraries
        > bp-ui-14.jar > META-INF > ui.tld

3. The ui.tld file of bp-ui-5.jar is opened
   from the project Explorer. 

   (Project) > Java Resoures: src
     > Libraries > Web App Libraries
        > bp-ui-5.jar > META-INF > ui.tld


More information:
The content of the TLD file is not displayed.
The following are displayed. 

org.eclipse.ui.PartInitException: Editor could not be initialized.
	at org.eclipse.ui.texteditor.AbstractTextEditor.internalInit(AbstractTextEditor.java:3035)
	at org.eclipse.ui.texteditor.AbstractTextEditor.init(AbstractTextEditor.java:3046)
	at org.eclipse.wst.sse.ui.StructuredTextEditor.init(StructuredTextEditor.java:2615)
	at org.eclipse.ui.part.MultiPageEditorPart.addPage(MultiPageEditorPart.java:186)
	at org.eclipse.ui.part.MultiPageEditorPart.addPage(MultiPageEditorPart.java:160)
	at org.eclipse.wst.xml.ui.internal.tabletree.XMLMultiPageEditorPart.addSourcePage(XMLMultiPageEditorPart.java:373)
	at org.eclipse.wst.xml.ui.internal.tabletree.XMLMultiPageEditorPart.createPages(XMLMultiPageEditorPart.java:543)
   :

I think that the following parts were problems.

org.eclipse.wst.sse.ui
  /src/org/eclipse/wst/sse/ui/internal/
    StorageModelProvider.java

The calculateID method returns the full path character string
in the JAR file as ID.
The JAR file name is not included in the character string. 

In the loadModel method, the first parameter of
StructuredModelManager.getModelManager().getModelForEdit method
should be unique. 

However, ui.tld encompassed by different JAR becomes the same ID
character string (/META-INF/ui.tld). 

What do you think ?
